title: Identify Project Risks
description: Based on a project plan, an agent must identify potential risks and suggest mitigation strategies.

tasks.description: Analyze the project plan, paying attention to dependencies, assumptions, and timeline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly reads and understands the project plan.

tasks.description: Identify at least five potential risks (e.g., 'key stakeholder unavailability', 'data access delays').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of relevant and plausible project risks.

tasks.description: For each risk, propose a potential mitigation strategy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent suggests a reasonable mitigation for each identified risk (e.g., 'confirm stakeholder schedule in advance').
